body.name: Perfectto Design Ballerina Princess Doll Stuffed Animal for Girls Toy Set - Bag, Tutu, Wings Play for 3 4 5 Year Old Girl Gift for Little Girl, Birthday, Christmas Age 3-9
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23. Order within 22 hrs 23 mins
FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 22 hrs 23 mins
features: 7 PIECE GIRL’S PRINCESS PLUSH DOLL SET - Soft and fluffy 19 inches Princess doll toy, pink dress, pink tutu, white tutu, furry shawl, golden wings and extra-large furry carry bag - SO MUCH LARGER than any other doll bag

THE PERFECT PRINCESS GIFT FOR GIRLS - This set comes with a large princess in its own XL plush carrier. There’s plenty of room for our stuffed doll set plus more toys and games. The Perfectto Princess Set is THE birthday gift for any little girl aged 3-9 (4 5 6 7 8 year old girl gift). Great gift toy for girls for Christmas and birthdays

PRINCESS STUFFED ANIMAL DOLL FOR GIRLS that your girl will love. Our set brings hours of pretend play and dress up into the life of your toddler and she will love the imaginary play. She’ll especially enjoy carrying the doll in her own soft and unique carry bag
FOR YOUR PEACE OF MIND - All parts are USA Children Certified. Made of the best and softest fabrics
WE AIM FOR PERFECTION – We design our own unique play sets for little girls like yours. We're here to help, feel free to contact us!
body.description: PERFECTTO TOY DESIGN - Where perfection and design go hand in hand.This is Sharon from Perfectto I LOVE MY JOB! I’m a mother, so all my design choices get tested on my own family before I bring them to you and I’ve never seen my girls more excited than with this precious PRINCESS doll. SAFETY, QUALITY AND SUITABILITY ARE OUR FIRST CONCERNS We maintain strict standards of only the best quality materials for our plush doll toys. They are durable, washable and practical while still being sweet and adorable. Of course, this product, as with all our products, is certified safe by the U.S.A. CPC so you know the product has been tested in a certified laboratory and found to be safe and suitable for your children. NOT JUST ANOTHER STUFFED TOY Small stuffed animal toys for kids are fun but your kids want more. Cuddly Princess doll plus so many accessories bring your child lots of enjoyment and imaginary fun play. Among the most significant benefits of allowing a girl to play with princess toys are that it sparks their creativity. In reality, it enables their imagination to run rampant. THE PRACTICAL SIDE OF THIS TOY The shaggy pink bag adds a practical element to this whole set. It is large enough to carry the Princess doll, her clothes and accessories, with lots of room to store other fun activities. Great for use at home or away. Perfect to take on long trips in the car, on the bus, train, or plane. Your little one will love having all her precious activities close to hand while away for a pleasant and less stressful trip. CHRISTMAS IS JUST AROUND THE CORNER and this is a great gift for your little princess from Mom and Dad, Grandma and Grandpa, aunts and uncles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My daughter loves it!
reviews.reviewText: This is so adorable, at 1st I was going to get her the unicorn, until i saw the bunny! The bunny was absolutely perfect and my 4 year old fell in love the second she laid eyes on her Christmas morning! She carries it around everywhere and absolutely adores it! Definitely worth the buy! All the cute accessories that come with are so fun to dress her up with! I love that there are options

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Box is too small
reviews.reviewText: This is a cute Unicorn and very soft. My complaint is the box that it comes in, not the Amazon shipping box, is too small and in order to get the unicorn with bag and clothes in the horn gets smushed. I took it out of the box immediately but had to smush it back in to be a Christmas gift for granddaughter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for 5 year old niece for Xmas. This stuffed doll with changeable outfits, will be the hit of her day!! The doll is so cute! The outfits are for a perfect ballerina! I cannot wait for her to open it-she is going to lose her mind!!! Perfect dream gift for all unicorn lovers!!
